SVNIRTAR Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 02 Assistant Professor Posts
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 23, 2025, 16:44 IST
 Swami Vivekanand National Institute of Rehabilitation Training and Research
 2 Jobs |  Posted On : 23-Aug-2025 |  Odisha |  Salary : 75,000 to 75,000




FOLLOW

Swami Vivekanand National Institute of Rehabilitation Training and Research (SVNIRTAR Cuttack) has introduced the latest job notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 02 Assistant Professor Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the M.Phil/ Ph.D can grab this chance and apply for the SVNIRTAR Recruitment 2025. Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the SVNIRTAR Recruitment 2025. Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date of application.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Odisha.

SVNIRTAR Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Assistant Professor 	02	M.Phil/ Ph.D

Age Limit for the SVNIRTAR Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 56 years.

Selection Process for the SVNIRTAR Recruitment 2025

Interview

Salary Structure for the SVNIRTAR Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 75,000 /- per month.

Application fee for the SVNIRTAR Recruitment 2025

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the SVNIRTAR Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Assistant Professor Jobs 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form carefully.
Then, send the application form to the address given below.

Address

Director, Swami Vivekanand National Institute of Rehabilitation Training & Research, At Olatpur, PO: Bairoi, Dist- Cuttack, Odisha, Pin-754010.

Important Dates

Starting Date of Application	04-08-2025
Last Date of Application	15-09-2025

 

Official Notification and Application Form	Click Here
